title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text: git add . git commit -m “Initial Quarto website commit” git branch -M main git push -u origin main

title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text:
Edit your _quarto.yml
project: type: website output-dir: _site # Ensure the output directory is set correctly
execute: freeze: auto

title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text:
Create workflows folder and publish.yml
mkdir -p .github/workflows touch .github/workflows/publish.yml
name: Quarto Publish with Jupyter Execution
on: push: branches: main # Deploy when code is pushed schedule: - cron: “0 6 * * *” # Runs daily at 6 AM UTC workflow_dispatch: # Allows manual trigger from GitHub Actions
jobs: build-deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest permissions: contents: write steps: - name: Check out repository uses: actions/checkout@v4
  - name: Set up Quarto
    uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/setup@v2

  - name: Install Python and Dependencies
    uses: actions/setup-python@v5
    with:
      python-version: '3.10'
      cache: 'pip'

  - name: Cache Python dependencies
    uses: actions/cache@v3
    with:
      path: ~/.cache/pip
      key: ${{ runner.os }}-pip-${{ hashFiles('requirements.txt') }}
      restore-keys: |
        ${{ runner.os }}-pip-

  - name: Install Required Packages
    run: |
      pip install --upgrade pip
      pip install jupyter quarto
      pip install -r requirements.txt  # Ensure this file lists dependencies

  - name: Execute Jupyter Notebooks
    run: |
      jupyter nbconvert --execute --to notebook notebooks/win_probabilities.ipynb

  - name: Render and Publish
    uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/publish@v2
    with:
      target: gh-pages
    env:
      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text:
Add requirements.txt
Create and fill in requirements.txt git add requirements.txt git commit -m “Add dependencies for Jupyter execution” git push origin main
git add .github/workflows/publish.yml git commit -m “Update GitHub Actions to execute Jupyter notebooks” git push origin main

title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text:
All future deployments
Since we are using GitHub Actions to handle rendering and publishing: quarto render –not needed quarto publish gh-pages not needed
git add . git commit -m “Updated content and notebooks” git push origin main
